Key Match Events: Freddie Freeman hit a walk-off grand slam home run in game 1
Shohei Ohtani suffered a shoulder injury on an attempted steal in game 3
Alex Verdugo hit a two-run homer in the bottom of the ninth inning in game 3
Pre-Game Insights: Dodgers opened the game with a heartwarming dedication to the memory of Fernando Valenzuela
Many baseball experts compared Valenzuela’s screwball to that of Carl Hubbell
The Yankees took a two-game to none lead before Valenzuela’s legendary game 3 performance
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Boone’s managing strategy in game one is under scrutiny
With the Dodgers leading 3-0, they are in the hero’s role following the first three games of this World Series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The first walk-off grand slam home run in World Series history decided game 1
Yankee reliever Nestor Cortes gave up the winning runs in game 1
Dodger starter Walker Buehler pitched 5 shutout innings in game 3
Others: Fernando Valenzuela was a dominant pitcher of the 1980s, winning 134 games
He made six National League All-Star teams and won two World Series titles with the Dodgers
His number 34 was retired by the Dodgers in 2023
